Class MinionModelTranslator

java.lang.Object
  MinionModelTranslator
All Implemented Interfaces:
MinionGlobals
public class MinionModelTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
implements MinionGlobals

MinionModelTranslator produces a constraint model for Minion from a list of decision variables and constraints.
